title: DongJin Tableware
description: As an Executive Designer at DongJin Tableware in Yangxin, Shandong, China, I led a team focused on marketing, design, and production. Specialized in graphic design, 3D modeling, and photography for product presentations and catalogs.

title: StoryGen
description: StoryGen is an AI-driven platform designed to create real-time narratives based on user inputs. Primarily focused on generating children's stories, the project aims to make storytelling accessible to everyone.

title: Ygdrasyl Project
description: Innovating the future of agriculture through automated, energy-efficient vertical farming solutions.
